channel.title: ramblings on obtusedev
channel.description: Recent content in ramblings on obtusedev

item.title: humbled
item.description: Went through a course for Go and saw a section on Go comments. Here I thought it was easy and that I knew everything there was about comments in Go. // and /**/ inline blocks and block comments. I stand corrected and now I understand the depth of comments in Go. That the documentation comments must end in a period, immediately precede a declaration and start with the name of the item you are documenting.
